content: materials - 3 6 skeins of purl soho s season alpaca 1 100% super baby alpaca each skein is 218 yards/ 100 grams approximately 654 1308 yards required we used fresh fig - us 4 3 5 mm 24-inch circular or straight needles 2 gauge 28 stitches and 34 row = 4 inches in stitch pattern unstretched 26 stitches and 36 row = 4 inches in stockinette stitch note for both sizes you will use just about all of yarn to avoid running out of yarn make sure you achieve this gauge sizes scarf wrap finished dimensions 7¾ 14¾ inches wide x 68 inches long unstretched sample we knit up the wrap size designed by purl soho designer jake canton 3 click here 4 to see even more of jake s designs 1 https //www purlsoho com/season-alpaca html 2 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/knitting-and-crochet html collection_filter=23796_23802 3 https //www purlsoho com/create/tag/jake-canton-for-purl-soho/ 4 http //www jakecanton com/
